context.phaseGoal: Create HIPAA BAA template, security whitepaper, and deployment checklist

userStories.title: Generate HIPAA BAA document template
userStories.description: Create BAA template in docs/legal/baa_template.md with HIPAA required clauses, AI-specific clauses, data use limitations, incident notification requirements.

userStories.title: Create Security Whitepaper
userStories.description: Write security docs in docs/security/security_whitepaper.md covering encryption, access control, HIPAA compliance, SOC 2 readiness.

userStories.title: Create vendor security questionnaire
userStories.description: Prepare answers in docs/security/vendor_questionnaire.md for common security assessment questions.

userStories.title: Create production deployment checklist
userStories.description: Document deployment steps in docs/deployment/production_checklist.md with env vars, migrations, DNS, SSL, monitoring.
